00093 class Point {
00094 private:
00095      double mX;   
00096      double mY;   
00097 public:
00099      Point() : mX(0), mY(0) {}
00100 
00106      Point(const Point& p) : mX(p.x()), mY(p.y()) {}
00107 
00114      void set(double x, double y) { mX = x; mY = y; }
00115 
00121      double x() const { return mX; }
00122 
00128      double y() const { return mY; }
00129 
00136      Point& operator = (const Point& p) { mX = p.x(); mY = p.y(); return *this; }
00137 
00144      bool operator < (const Point& p) const { return ( (mX < p.x()) || ( (mX == p.x()) && (mY < p.y()) ) ); }
00145 
00152      bool operator == (const Point& p) const { return ( (mX == p.x()) && (mY == p.y()) ); }
00153 };

00162 private:

00164      Point mP1;         
00165      Point mP2;

00168

00175 
00181      const Point& p1() const { return mP1; }
00182 
00188      const Point& p2() const { return mP2; }
00189 };
